member.name: M:USB.Host.Info.IsDevicePresent
member.summary: Checks if a USB device is available.
member.returns: This method returns true, if a USB device is present and configured.

member.name: M:USB.Host.Info.GetVID
member.summary: Gets the Vendor ID of the currently connected USB device.
member.returns: When this method completes successfully, it returns the Vendor ID as a unsigned integer.

member.name: M:USB.Host.Info.GetPID
member.summary: Gets the Product ID of the currently connected USB device.
member.returns: When this method completes successfully, it returns the Product ID as a unsigned integer.

member.name: M:USB.Host.Info.GetSerialNumber
member.summary: Gets the Serial Number of the currently connected USB device.
member.returns: When this method completes successfully, it returns the products serial number name as a string.

member.name: M:USB.Host.Info.GetManufacturerString
member.summary: Gets the Manufacturer of the currently connected USB device.
member.returns: When this method completes successfully, it returns the Manufacturer name as a string.

member.name: M:USB.Host.Info.GetProductString
member.summary: Gets the Product name of the currently connected USB device.
member.returns: When this method completes successfully, it returns the Product name as a string.
